text: He loka sakala! Ekati upama barnana kara halo, ata'eba tomara ta manoyoga diye sona; tomara allahara paribarte yadera puja kara, tara kakhana'o ekati machi srsti karate parabe na, yadi'o tara sakale ekatrita haya. Ara machi yadi tadera kacha theke kona kichu chiniye neya, tabe tara tara kacha theke ta ud'dhara karate parabe na, prarthanakari o yara kache prarthana kara haya, ubhaye'i saktihina.
